entry.title: Drafts in Octopress
entry.content:
Let’s say you start a new post in Octopress bash Terminal $ rake new_post["Drafts in Octopress"] Next time you generate and deploy the post will be published. To change that, edit the file like so, adding published: false to the YAML header:

``` yaml 2013-10-05-drafts-in-octopress.markdown

layout: post title: “Drafts in Octopress” date: 2013-10-05 10:36 comments: true categories:

published: false

`` When you're previewing withrake preview`, you will still to see the drafts that aren’t published.
